meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jocelyn Casser Dave Ellis Silvio Menzano Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6012.

td.p: Jocelyn Casser, a stay-at-home mom from Baltimore, Maryland
Dave Ellis, a singer-songwriter from Los Angeles, California
Silvio Menzano, a psychologist and university counseling center director from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,300)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Modernist jeweler Art Smith opened his first shop in this New York City "Village" in 1946')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Modernist jeweler Art Smith opened his first shop in this New York City "Village" in 1946

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Jocelyn: What are bowling pins?)

billiard balls

DaveJocelyn
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Once made of ivory, today they\'re made of plastic & weigh 5 1/2 to 6 ounces; rack \'em up!')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Once made of ivory, today they're made of plastic & weigh 5 1/2 to 6 ounces; rack 'em up!

toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Jocelyn: What is Rome?)

')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Silvio: What is yellow? ...And...)
(Dave: What is green or yellow?)
(Alex: The two colors are [*]. We needed both, Silvio, and you looked so comfortable, but you just gave us one of them.)

white & yellow

SilvioDave
Triple Stumper
')

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
